name: GemHunt
description:
GemHunt is a simple game that has two objectives; collect gems, and get to the exit portal!

Gems come in five types, all giving you different point amounts. Avoid boulders that will fall on you as you dig though each level.

ATTENTION MEMBERS OF GLYPHIC ENIGMA:

If you are a member, you can purchase this game on the Club Shop for 25 credits.
